entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with flurries before morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along the Strait. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along the Strait. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
